name: code-agent-tools
description: Monorepo containing tools for using coding agents

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=packages/ai-review && npm run build --workspace=packages/agent-sandbox
scripts.publish:ai-review: npm run build:ai-review && npm publish packages/ai-review
scripts.publish:sandbox: npm run build:sandbox && npm publish packages/agent-sandbox
scripts.publish:all: npm run build && npm publish packages/ai-review && npm publish packages/agent-sandbox
